languages.text: The wielder of this staff, with a power level of {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}, gains the Emperor's Wrath {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Using Emperor's Wrath grants the psyker additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the staff's power level until the start of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}
languages.original_text: На {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6} уровне посоха становится доступна {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Гнев Императора. Также варианты этой способности доступны в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героического акта{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g}. Значение {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от этой силы зависит от уровня посоха. Применяя Гнев Императора, псайкер получает бонус к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}, равный уровню посоха, до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Эффект не суммируется. +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}

traits.locale_text: The wielder of this staff, with a power level of (5 + psyker's resolve), gains the Emperor's Wrath ability. The ability is also available in its heroic act and desperate measure versions. Power level affects the damage of this power. Using Emperor's Wrath grants the psyker additional armour equal to the staff's power level until the start of the psyker's next turn. Does not stack. +15 Willpower +10 Fellowship

The wielder of this staff, with a power level of (5 + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}), gains the Emperor's Wrath {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Using Emperor's Wrath grants the psyker additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the staff's power level until the start of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}

The wielder of this staff, with a power level of {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}, gains the Emperor's Wrath {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Using Emperor's Wrath grants the psyker additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the staff's power level until the start of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}

The wielder of this staff, with a power level of {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}, gains the Emperor's Wrath {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Using Emperor's Wrath grants the psyker additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the staff's power level until the start of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}

languages.text: 这根法杖的力量等级为{uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}，会赋予使用者神皇之怒{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。这个能力既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。力量等级会影响此能力造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。 使用神皇之怒时，灵能者会获得额外的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，等同于法杖的力量等级，效果持续至灵能者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。此效果不可叠加。 +15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff, with a power level of {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}, gains the Emperor's Wrath {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Using Emperor's Wrath grants the psyker additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the staff's power level until the start of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}

traits.locale_text: 这根法杖的力量等级为（5+灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}），会赋予使用者神皇之怒{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。这个能力既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。力量等级会影响此能力造成的伤害。 使用神皇之怒时，灵能者会获得额外的{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}，等同于法杖的力量等级，效果持续至灵能者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。此效果不可叠加。 +15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}

这根法杖的力量等级为{uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}，会赋予使用者神皇之怒{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。这个能力既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。力量等级会影响此能力造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。 使用神皇之怒时，灵能者会获得额外的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，等同于法杖的力量等级，效果持续至灵能者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。此效果不可叠加。 +15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}

languages.text: この杖の使用者でパワーレベルが{uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}の場合、皇帝の怒り{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。このアビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}中および{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}においても使用可能である。パワーレベルはこのパワーの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に影響を及ぼす。 皇帝の怒りを使用すると異能者は杖のパワーレベルに相当する追加{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を異能者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで獲得する。この効果は累積しない。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+15増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}が+10増加
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff, with a power level of {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}, gains the Emperor's Wrath {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Using Emperor's Wrath grants the psyker additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the staff's power level until the start of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}

traits.locale_text: この杖の使用者でパワーレベルが（5+異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}）の場合、皇帝の怒り{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。このアビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}中および{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}においても使用可能である。パワーレベルはこのパワーのダメージに影響を及ぼす。 皇帝の怒りを使用すると異能者は杖のパワーレベルに相当する追加{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}を異能者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで獲得する。この効果は累積しない。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が15増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}が10増加

この杖の使用者でパワーレベルが{uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}の場合、皇帝の怒り{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。このアビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}中および{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}においても使用可能である。パワーレベルはこのパワーの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に影響を及ぼす。 皇帝の怒りを使用すると異能者は杖のパワーレベルに相当する追加{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を異能者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで獲得する。この効果は累積しない。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+15増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}が+10増加

languages.text: El portador de este báculo con nivel de poder {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6} gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Ira del Emperador. Esta capacidad también está disponible como {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}. El nivel de poder afecta al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de este poder. Usar Ira del Emperador proporciona al psíquico {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} adicional igual al nivel de poder del báculo hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto no es acumulativo. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff, with a power level of {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}, gains the Emperor's Wrath {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Using Emperor's Wrath grants the psyker additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the staff's power level until the start of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}

traits.locale_text: El portador de este báculo con nivel de poder (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del psíquico) gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Ira del Emperador. Esta capacidad también está disponible como {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}. El nivel de poder afecta al daño de este poder. Usar Ira del Emperador proporciona al psíquico {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} adicional igual al nivel de poder del báculo hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto no es acumulativo. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}

El portador de este báculo con nivel de poder {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6} gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Ira del Emperador. Esta capacidad también está disponible como {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}. El nivel de poder afecta al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de este poder. Usar Ira del Emperador proporciona al psíquico {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} adicional igual al nivel de poder del báculo hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto no es acumulativo. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}

languages.text: Обладатель посоха (уровень посоха равен {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}) получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Гнев Императора. Также варианты этой способности доступны в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героического акта{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g}. Значение {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от этой силы зависит от уровня посоха. Применяя Гнев Императора, псайкер получает бонус к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}, равный уровню посоха, до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Эффект не суммируется. +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}

The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Using Emperor's Wrath grants the psyker additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the staff's power level until the start of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}

Также варианты этой способности доступны в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героического акта{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g}. Значение урона от этой силы зависит от уровня посоха. Применяя Гнев Императора, псайкер получает бонус к {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броне{/g}, равный уровню посоха, до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Эффект не суммируется. +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}

Эффект не суммируется. +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}

languages.text: Der Träger dieses Stabes mit einer Energiestufe von {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6} erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Imperators Zorn. Die Fähigkeit ist auch in den Versionen {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} verfügbar. Die Energiestufe beeinflusst den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} dieser Kraft. Der Einsatz von Imperators Zorn verleiht dem Psioniker bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} in Höhe der Energiestufe des Stabes. Nicht stapelbar. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff, with a power level of {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}, gains the Emperor's Wrath {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Using Emperor's Wrath grants the psyker additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the staff's power level until the start of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}

traits.locale_text: Der Träger dieses Stabs mit einer Energiestufe von (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} des Psionikers) erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Imperators Zorn. Die Fähigkeit ist auch in den Versionen {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} verfügbar. Die Energiestufe beeinflusst den Schaden dieser Kraft. Der Einsatz von Imperators Zorn verleiht dem Psioniker bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} in Höhe der Energiestufe des Stabs. Kann nicht aufaddiert werden. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}

Der Träger dieses Stabs mit einer Energiestufe von {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6} erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Imperators Zorn. Die Fähigkeit ist auch in den Versionen {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} verfügbar. Die Energiestufe beeinflusst den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} dieser Kraft. Der Einsatz von Imperators Zorn verleiht dem Psioniker bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} in Höhe der Energiestufe des Stabs. Stapelt sich nicht.ll +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}

languages.text: Doté d'un niveau de puissance de {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}, l'utilisateur de ce bâton obtient la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Colère de l'Empereur. Des versions {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acte héroïque{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Mesure désespérée{/g} de cette capacité sont également disponibles. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés dépendent du niveau de puissance. Colère de l'Empereur confère au psyker des points d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} supplémentaires correspondant au niveau de puissance du bâton jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Non cumulable. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff, with a power level of {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}, gains the Emperor's Wrath {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Using Emperor's Wrath grants the psyker additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the staff's power level until the start of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}

traits.locale_text: Doté d'un niveau de puissance de {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}, l'utilisateur de ce bâton obtient la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Colère de l'Empereur. Des versions {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acte héroïque{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Mesure désespérée{/g} de cette capacité sont également disponibles. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés dépendent du niveau de puissance. Colère de l'Empereur confère au psyker des points d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} supplémentaires correspondant au niveau de puissance du bâton jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Non cumulable. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}

Doté d'un niveau de puissance de {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}, l'utilisateur de ce bâton acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Colère de l'Empereur. Les versions {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acte Héroïque{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Mesure Désespérée{/g} de cette capacité sont également disponibles. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés dépendent du niveau de puissance. Colère de l'Empereur confère au psyker une {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} supplémentaire correspondant au niveau de puissance du bâton jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Non cumulable. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}

languages.text: Bu asayı kullanan kişi, asa {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6} güç seviyesine ulaştığında İmparator'un Gazabı {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetini{/g} kazanır. Bu kabiliyetin ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlem{/g} hâlleri de mevcuttur. Güç seviyesi, bu gücün vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} da etki eder. İmparator'un Gazabı'nı kullanmak, ruhsezere asanın güç seviyesi kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} kazandırır. Bu etki, ruhsezerin bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başına dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g}

The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Using Emperor's Wrath grants the psyker additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the staff's power level until the start of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
